response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but considering its importance to you, I believe we can find common ground. I am offering you the chance to own this product for $950,000. This price reflects the product's true worth and acknowledges its value to you. I am confident that this offer presents a favorable balance between our interests. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
